name: Wonderer
description:
Wanderer is a short top down shooter video game about a wonderer who fell in a cave and now he has to kill strange creatures and monsters to escape.It was made in 1 month 

Made by:

Music:Ljubisa Filiposki

Programing:Ljubisa Filiposki

Art:Ljubisa Filiposki

Play Testers who helped test the game:

Matej Pecinovic

Antonio Vidoeski

Alek Kirov

Made with Blackthornprod's action game course

Download for Better looks and fps
